children.value: Splits a string to an array based on the delimiter passed.

tags.title: returns
tags.description: Returns an array of the split string.

children.value: string to convert to array
where to split the string
Returns an array of the split string.
Converts any value to a Boolean equivalent.
Note:
If no user-defined array is passed, the default true values are:
'true', 'yes', 'y', '1'

tags.title: param
tags.description: value to check if true or false
tags.name: val

tags.title: param
tags.description: optional array of user defined true values
tags.name: trueValuesArr

tags.title: returns
tags.description: Returns a boolean equivalent of the value.

children.value: value to check if true or false
optional array of user defined true values
Returns a boolean equivalent of the value.
Get a random pastel color.
Returns an HSL color.
Checks if the type of the value is the expected type.

tags.title: param
tags.description: the type to check the value against
tags.name: expectedType

tags.title: returns
tags.description: Returns a boolean if the type of the value matches to expectedType.

children.value: any value to check
the type to check the value against
Returns a boolean if the type of the value matches to expectedType.

tags.description: Returns a human readable file size.

number of decimals to show

tags.name: delimiter

Converts a string to Sentence case.

tags.title: param
tags.description: string to convert to Sentence case
tags.name: string

tags.title: example
tags.description:
StringUtil.toSentenceCase('THE QUICK BROWN FOX');
// => 'The quick brown fox'

examples.description:
StringUtil.toSentenceCase('THE QUICK BROWN FOX');
// => 'The quick brown fox'

children.value: string to convert to Sentence case
Returns a Sentence case string.
Converts a string to a Title Case.

tags.title: param
tags.description: string to convert to Title Case
tags.name: string

tags.title: example
tags.description:
StringUtil.toTitleCase('the quick brown fox');
// => 'The Quick Brown Fox'

examples.description:
StringUtil.toTitleCase('the quick brown fox');
// => 'The Quick Brown Fox'

children.value: string to convert to Title Case
Returns a Tile Case string.
